name: Invisibility, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook. © 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text:
EFFECT

Target you or creature touched
Duration 1 round/level (D)
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless)

DESCRIPTION

This spell functions like invisibility, except that it doesn't end if the subject attacks.
target_zh: 自己 或 接触到的生物
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘隐形术 (invisibility)’一般，不过它并不会在受术者攻击时结束。
